name: Alex's One-Skillet Chili Rellenos
ingredients: 3 1/2 ounces American cheese, cut up, 5 slices
3 ounces mozzarella or quesadilla cheese, shredded

instructions.en: Brown ground beef and onion in a large skillet; drain fat well.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso a cibuľu na veľkej panvici; dobre zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉と玉ねぎを炒めて茶色くし、脂をよく切ります。

instructions.en: Add water, bouillon, and seasonings. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes.
instructions.sk: Pridajte vodu, bujón a korenie. Priveďte do varu a varte 5 minút.
instructions.ja: 水、ブイヨン、調味料を加えます。沸騰させて5分間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Stir in peppers, cover, and simmer for 5 more minutes.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte papriky, prikryte a varte ďalších 5 minút.
instructions.ja: ピーマンを加えて混ぜ、蓋をして5分間煮込みます。

instructions.en: Stir in cheeses and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes to melt the cheese.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte syry a varte odkryté 5 minút, aby sa syr roztopil.
instructions.ja: チーズを加えて混ぜ、蓋を取って5分間煮込み、チーズを溶かします。

notes: Makes 3-4 servings. Do not freeze. The author used one green pepper and one yellow pepper.
